item.title: nf-core/modules
item.description: Repository to host tool-specific module files for the Nextflow DSL2 community!

item.title: nf-core/rnaseq
item.description: RNA sequencing analysis pipeline using STAR, RSEM, HISAT2 or Salmon with gene/isoform counts and extensive quality control.
